So you get the early part of a trend which is the trendsetters and this is the phase
where effectively a new piece of information is in the market, participants want to aggressively
initiate because prices are trading at an extreme discount or an extreme premium based
on the new information so that's the early part of the trend.
part of the trend or the maturing phase of the trend.
